name: Code Talker
description:
You are a hired gun tasked with tackling the case of "Code Talker" who is supposedly a corrupt man using shamanic arts to terrorize the country.

CONTROLS:

WASD keys to move.

(the arrow keys work too)

R to Reload.

 (weapons do not auto-reload when empty, you have to manually press R to reload)

M to open Map.

(shows current position and rooms discovered prior for easier backtracking)

123 keys to change Weapons.

(from SMG, Pistol, Shotgun, SMAW and Laser gun, be careful for ammo is limited)

Defeated Enemies Drop Moni (gold?) Use moni to buy ammo and stat upgrades (hearts too!) Fight cool bosses (bullet hell!)
Use the portal to teleport (teleports you to any discovered room of choice!)


TIP: to use the portal place mouse cursor over the lever on the portal and press, that's the activator.

  It will be highlighted in white meaning its clickable.
